original_title: Largest studio at the Stein Studios named after late Mr. R. Rajamahendran
original_body_lines: COLOMBO(News 1st): On the occasion of Sirasa TV's 25th anniversary, the largest studio at the Stein Studios, Ratmalana was named after the former Chairman of the Capital Maharaja Group the late Mr. R. Rajamahendran, with religious observances marking the occasion as well.
Chairman of the Capital Maharaja Group, Sashi Rajamahendran, along with the senior management of the company attended this occasion.

“We are sitting here in the cradled of creativity. The future of media doesn't lie in TV, Radio or Digital. But its production, content. Everything else is just a means to transmit it. But we invested in this a long time ago knowing that our most valuable asset is intellectual property and the content we produce.'' Chairman of the Capital Maharaja Group Sashi Rajamahendran said during the event.

“Everywhere you go in Sri Lanka there is not a person who does not hold Mr. Rajamahendran's commitment leadership close in their hearts. And I think that makes today so much more special.” Group Director of the Capital Maharaja Group Chevaan Daniel said during the event.
